author: andschwa
body: Implement the WS-Man client protocol for Linux and Mac.

comments.author: mklemm2
comments.body: May seem like a dumb question: Was this implemented or not?

comments.author: paulcallen
comments.body: PSRP over WSMAN from Windows to Linux is in place. [PSRP over WSMAN](https://github.com/PowerShell/psl-omi-provider). Client-side from Linux to Windows is in progress.

title: Implement client API for PSRP remoting
